title: Webinars
subtitle: Recorded sessions and live webinars on operational excellence topics.

webinar1.title: Introduction to G2P Framework
webinar1.description: Learn the fundamentals of the Governance-to-Performance framework and how it can transform your operations.

webinar2.title: Operational Excellence for Startups
webinar2.description: Practical strategies for implementing operational improvements in early-stage companies.

webinar3.title: Building Governance Maturity
webinar3.description: Deep dive into the 5 G2P indices and how to improve each one systematically.

customDescription: Need a webinar on a specific topic? Let us know and we'll schedule one for your team.
